title: [Gameplay] Slayer Jinx Auto "Sticks"
body: So I recently bought Slayer Jinx because as soon as I saw it, I fell in love with it. Unfortunately, I now have the side effect of her auto animation "hanging" or "sticking" to the minions (or whatever I'm autoing). This only happens when I use her minigun, but it can be seen on my boyfriend's screen as well so presumably everyone can see her trio of bullets just... hovering above the creep for a second. If necessary I can try to get a screenshot at some point but it's kinda distracting when trying to last hit creeps.

replies.body:
Hey ZenaSpiritdragon! 

Thanks for the solid report! We're aware of this issue and are working to resolve it!
